RainbruRPG::Server::ServerHelpViewer

RainbruRPG::Server::ServerHelpViewer Class Reference

#include <helpviewer.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A basic HTML viewer used to show the html format of the texinfo manual.

Member Data Documentation

QUrl RainbruRPG::Server::ServerHelpViewer::home [private]

The home url.

It is the index.html location, where the help start. If a home button is created, this URL will be linked to.
